name: Attach Gallery Posts
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Used to add galleries to posts in a WordPress site.

sections.installation: Copy “attach-gallery-post” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory. Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.6

Verified compatibility with wp 4.0

1.5

Removed old ajax plugin files and verified compat with wp 3.9.1

1.4

Added search box to easily find gallery to attach. Made galleries 1 to many instead of 1 to 1.

1.3

Fixed how gallery_post_list is handled

1.2

Removed the errant JS alert I left in there.

1.1

Changed the image link in the meta box to edit the media instead of display the image.

1.0.1

Added license and copyright information

1.0

  • Initial version

short_description: Plugin for WordPress that allows you to attach a post with a gallery to another post.
